name: Sanganan IT Solutions
tagline: IT Solutions that make a difference
description:
At Sanganan our goal is to help you realize the full potential of today's cutting-edge technologies-so you can make work easier and more efficient for knowledge workers at every level in your organization. Sanganan connects people to the right information at the right time, helping them make better-informed, faster decisions.
Our team is focused on delivering relevant, accurate and timely answers and insights that help businesses find new revenue, improve decision-making and solve business problems. From business analytics to collaboration solutions and customized enterprise applications, we can help you connect people with the information, tools and processes they need to get work done-and make your business thrive.
With offices in Noida, India, Sanganan combines offshore cost-efficiency and 24 hour work cycles with direct team interaction at your location-delivering low-risk, high-performance solutions to help you improve communications, streamline workflow and increase productivity.
